name: Trooper Coopers Campsite Clean-Up
description:
“Hey there friend, I’m Trooper Cooper, and my job is to keep these campgrounds clean and safe. I heard you’ll be helping me out, so let me show you what we do ‘round these parts.”

“I have a list of lost items that we are looking to recover on the trail, and your job is to help me locate them. Some of these will be tricky to find, so keep an eye out as we go along.”

“When you see one of the items, select it and match it to the one on the itinerary. Once we’ve found all the items, we can call it a day.”

“We’re about to begin our search, so follow along and keep your eyes peeled!”
